import React from 'react' class Form extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state = { title : "", responsible : "", description: "", priority : "low" } this.hInput = this.hInput.bind(this); } hInput(e){ const { value, name } = e.target; this.setState({ [name] : value }) } render(){ return(
) } } export default Form;
